original_title: No decision to suspend Fuel Pass: Kanchana
original_body_lines: No decision has been taken to suspend the National Fuel Pass QR system from 10th April, Power and Energy Minister Kanchana Wijesekara said.
He said National Fuel Pass data will be analyzed to gradually increase the quotas that have been allocated.
He tweeted that “Decisions on the system will be taken in consultation with the Finance Ministry and other stakeholders in the next few months” (Ajith Siriwardana)
